channel.title: Map Ideas
channel.description: Have a cool map idea? Share it with the world here!

item.title: HallOfGiants in LEGOs
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
DM-HallOfGiants is my favorite map, though I've multiple versions of it and not all are for deathmatches. Recently even found one for CTF4...

...but I digress.

I'm a skinner but I've no mapping skills whatsoever. From other maps I've collected numerous LEGO textures and I think I'm about as ready to give it a shot as I'm able to but I'm a tad nervous.

Other than just using UnrealEd for skins, I find it a smidge daunting.

Still, it'd be an awful sweet map in LEGOs.

item.title: Bloody Blocks Remake ?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hubs)
item.dc:creator: Hubs
item.content:encoded:
I used to play this map called Bloody Blocks over at ZoobsWorld (teamut)when ut99 was my game ( oh those where the days) . Now that I have moved on to ut 03 , was hoping someone might no of a remake and if so where it can be downloaded ( great rocket whore map) with exploding legos everywhere.
If there has not been an atempt for a remake. I believe it might convert nicely over to 03. Sure would like to see a good map maker take a crack at it.

item.title: Map idea: CTF-UrbanFace
item.author: invalid@example.com (L4Y Duke)
item.dc:creator: L4Y Duke
item.content:encoded:
Two rival companies each take the opportunity that the Skaarj invasion presents in order to take out the other via. a 'hostile takeover'.

Except, y'know, without the takeover part.

It's a Face-esque map with an urban setting. Two buildings located on opposite sides of a large park area. Each building has three stories, with the flag on the ground floor in the 'reception' area, behind the desk. The top two stories are sniper positions, with the roof offering further sniper...

Map idea: CTF-UrbanFace

item.title: Dragon Arena?
item.author: invalid@example.com (shadow_dragon)
item.dc:creator: shadow_dragon
item.content:encoded:
Just thinking about map ideas, not sure if anyone else has played the latest Mortal Kombat game, Deadly Alliance?
But basically that's the concept, except of course that's just a ring, i'm thinking more like a hot air balloon-esque setup! A huge dragon flyging through som nice, mountainous skybox or so, and strapped under neath him the arena, with ledges and walkways, possibly one of the walk ways spiralling up ontop of the dragon or so! The interior is uppose would be like a chinesedojo or...

Dragon Arena?

item.title: Unusual idea: Creating movie with UnrealEd2
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ethax)
item.dc:creator: Ethax
item.content:encoded:
Hi!

As it's the third place where I share my things, firstly here's this in few words:

Ethax said: ↑
I thinked so that my plans will not cause confusion, but sorry if yes...
So, I explain my project more detailed:
Every intros, ingame dialogues and/or movies are simple maps where every movements and actions are predefinied (with triggers). But this isn't rare in SP maps, too. (For Examp.: If the player reaches to new place where new enemies waiting...
Click to expand...
Unusual idea: Creating movie with UnrealEd2

item.title: Crime themed DM stage! IDEA/CONCEPT ONLY, NEED SOMEONE TO MAKE THIS REALITY.
item.author: invalid@example.com (redeyeguy)
item.dc:creator: redeyeguy
item.content:encoded:
Unfortunately, I won't be the one makin this map, as I don't know how, and very soon I'll be workin a full time shift + studyin, so I pretty much won't have any time for anythin except on the weekends. But I think it would be interestin if someone decided to take up this idea and make it a reality. Here's the basic concept:

- UT99 of course! UT2004 compatibility is optional, but not necessary. I only have UT99 anyway, so if it was 2004, then I wouldn't be able to play this stage.

- An...

Crime themed DM stage! IDEA/CONCEPT ONLY, NEED SOMEONE TO MAKE THIS REALITY.

item.title: New or Old?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Anderson)
item.dc:creator: Anderson
item.content:encoded:
I was just curios what peoples thoughts were on styles of maps. Whats your preference, Oldskool style maps nothing fancy, just a hardcore map, older style textures(or retail textures), simple design, not cluttered with decorations and stuff like that, or Newer maps with detailed textures(hourences packs lots of decoration and attention to little details that kill your computer(mine)

Mine are the oldskool style maps, i love there simplicity in design, when i play a map, i dont want to...

New or Old?

item.title: Unreal Championship 2 UT2K4 Maps
item.author: invalid@example.com (omnius)
item.dc:creator: omnius
item.content:encoded: How about taking some of the UC2 maps and making them for UT2K4?

item.title: \\\Theme Design Contest///
item.author: invalid@example.com (Nahand)
item.dc:creator: Nahand
item.content:encoded:
\\\Theme Design Contest/// (for Unreal Tournament)

The point in Theme Design Contest (TDC) is to create a nice (preferably new) theme for a given BSP base, and although its a DM layout (this time), contestants can create a theme (& map) for ANY OFFICIAL UT GAMETYPE. In the end, a mappack will be assembled.

The "contest" starts as of the time of this post (February) and ends at the 17th of March (entries should be in my possession...

\\\Theme Design Contest///

item.title: Mappack Idea: MonsterHunt mappack
item.author: invalid@example.com (Larkin)
item.dc:creator: Larkin
item.content:encoded:
How about a Monster Hunt mappack. I've never seen one and I think it would be pretty cool. I would do it but I don't have any maps out and I don't know how to create a Monster Hunt map.

Even more I don't have the respect or the trust of the mapping community to be able to do a mappack. So what I asking is, if someone is interested in doing a mappack for Monster Hunt. I bet people would join.

item.title: Next Generation - Funnel map debate
item.author: invalid@example.com (Animbadabar)
item.dc:creator: Animbadabar
item.content:encoded:
Hello!
Before anybody sends me hurtling to the ground in flames I want to say that I'm trying to get people who play the funnel map scene to take a bit more pride in mapping and in general raise the standard of the gametype. There is a real opportunity for strategy for those who want to avoid the spam, and the games have potential to be more than a close quarter spawnkill fest and still remain really good relaxing fun.

I'm posting a few pictures of my latest WIP for 2k4, which is the...

Next Generation - Funnel map debate

item.title: Pimp My Map/1337 Mappers Mapping Noob Maps Contest
item.author: invalid@example.com (GTD-Carthage)
item.dc:creator: GTD-Carthage
item.content:encoded:
Well, it's one thread but I have two ideas. I'm quite inspired by the countless noob-maps I've seen everywhere and even in the threads in the main forums. Here's something I thought of for the noobs - or, rather, the back-part of the U-community.

---Pimp My Map---
When I say "Pimp My Map", I'm not necessarily requesting someone to help me map.

In MTV, there's this show called Pimp My Ride whereas some of the world's most ugly-looking mismanaged and neglected cars...

Pimp My Map/1337 Mappers Mapping Noob Maps Contest

item.title: Map Idea: Laputa
item.author: invalid@example.com (Larkin)
item.dc:creator: Larkin
item.content:encoded:
Is any one else here a Hayao Miyazaki movie nut? Well anyway I think it would be cool to see a map that looked like Laputa. You know Laputa from Laputa: Castle in the Sky. It would make for the best DOM map ever or maybe even Assault.

I really would like this in UT, but its probably impossible.

UT2004 would best suit it I think.
